data.title: Publications on Standards and Recommended Practices
data.text:
The publications generated by the Committee are listed below. Until 1986, the Committee was called the Standards Committee. However, only governments may propose standards and since 1986 it has been called the Recommended Practices Committee.

The standards or Recommended Practices were also published in the Journal of Vacuum Science and Technology (JVST), and the reference is given; these are also listed in the Fall 2003 issue of the AVS Newsletter.

*Reprinted in AVS Recommended Practices on Vacuum Measurements & Techniques, Vol. 1, S-2, available from the AVS ($35).

All standards till 1972 were listed in NBS 329 Index of U S Voluntary Engineering Standards

1958

Standards and Nomenclature, Glossary of Terms.

1963

Standard 4.1 Procedure for Measuring the Speed of Oil-Diffusion Pumps

JVST 8(5) Sep/Oct 1971, pp. 664-668.

Std 4.2 Procedure for Measuring Throughput of Oil-Diffusion Pumps

JVST 8(5) Sep/Oct 1971, pp. 668-669.

4.3 Procedure for Measuring the Fore-pressure Characteristics of Oil-Diffusion Pumps

JVST 8(5) Sep/Oct 1971, pp. 669-670.

4.4 Procedure for Measuring the Ultimate Pressure of Oil-Diffusion Pumps JVST 8(5) Sep/Oct 1971, pp. 670-671.

Std 4.5 Procedure for Measuring Backstreaming of Oil-Diffusion Pumps

JVST 8(5) Sep/Oct 1971, pp. 671-673.

Std 4,7 Procedure for Measuring the Ultimate Pressure of Pumps without Working Fluid

JVST 8(5) Sep/Oct 1971, pp. 674-675.

1989

Replaces Std. 2.2 (1968)

AVS Recommended Practices on Vacuum Measurements and Techniques, Vol. 1,

AVS Monograph S-02 (Robert E. Ellefson, Chair of Recommended Practices Committee) contains:

20.1 for Measuring Pumping Speeds, M H Hablanian, JVST A5, 2552 (1987)

50.1 A Survey of Vacuum Material Cleaning Procedure Y Tito Sasaki, A9, 2025 (1991)

2001

2001 Practical guide to the use of Bayard-Alpert ionization gauges
